description: Episode of Series "Single Concept Drug Films" Informational film on the hazards associated with the abuse of common domestic and industrial chemicals: solvents, aerosol propellants, and anaesthetics. Alludes briefly to the injury which can result from the toxicity of these chemicals - permanent impairment of motor function and acute organ pathology. Directed more towards adult caregivers than the children and adolescents who are more likely to abuse these substances.
